name: REWORK ReimuReimuGo - DuckDuckGo Touhou
description:
This style is a rework of the original Duvet theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/177332/deprecated-reimureimugo-duckduckgo-touhou
It works perfectly now

(Original drawing by Yuuka Nonoko)
(Original concept by Siss-Sama : https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/2867-satorinsatoringo
